mapper.select: SELECT Q.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID as isQuick FROM ORDERS_DETAIL O LEFT JOIN QUICK_LAUNDRY Q ON (O.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID = Q.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT D.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID as isDry FROM ORDERS_DETAIL O LEFT JOIN DRYCLEANING D ON (O.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID)
WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT C.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID as isCommon FROM ORDERS_DETAIL O LEFT JOIN COMMON_LAUNDRY C ON (O.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID = C.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT R.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID as isRepair FROM ORDERS_DETAIL O LEFT JOIN REPAIR R ON (O.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID = R.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUPON_LIST_ID, MEMBER_ID, COUPON_ID, COUPON_LIST_CREATE_DATE, COUPON_LIST_STATUS, ORDERS_ID, COUPON_END_DATE FROM COUPON_LIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY COUPON_LIST_ID DESC
